mapper.sql: name , resume , state , is_deleted , creator_id , gmt_create , gmt_update
mapper.select: select role_id from user_role where user_id = #{userId} AND is_deleted = 'N'
mapper.update:
UPDATE sys_role SET
name = #{name} ,
resume = #{resume} ,
state = #{state} ,
creator_id = #{creatorId} ,
gmt_update = NOW() WHERE role_id = #{roleId}
mapper.delete: UPDATE sys_role SET is_deleted = 'Y' WHERE role_id = #{roleId}
mapper.select: SELECT sa.authority_id , sa.authority_name , sa.authority_type FROM sys_role_authority_ref srar INNER JOIN user_role ur ON ur.role_id = srar.role_id INNER JOIN sys_authority sa ON srar.authority_id = sa.authority_id WHERE ur.user_id = #{userId} GROUP BY sa.authority_id
SELECT sr.role_id, sr.name , sr.resume , sr.state , sr.creator_id , sr.gmt_create, srm.menu_id FROM sys_role sr LEFT JOIN sys_role_menu srm ON sr.role_id = srm.role_id WHERE sr.is_deleted = 'N'
